SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Enum Class Server

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Server>
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Server>, Constable
public enum Server extends Enum<Server>
The server is implemented using the Singleton pattern. It handles users, lobbies and starting games.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Server entrypoint, must be called to start the Codex Naturalis server.
      Parameters:
      args - not needed, they are ignored

    • checkConnections

      public void checkConnections()
      Function that checks if clients are connected and updates their status otherwise.

    • joinLobby

      public boolean joinLobby(UserInfo userInfo, int lobbyId)
      Adds the user to the lobby with the given id.
      Parameters:
      userInfo - The userInfo of the user who wants to join the lobby
      lobbyId - The lobby id
      Returns:
      True if joining was successfull, false if the lobby doesn't exist or if the user is already in the lobby.

    • leaveLobby

      public boolean leaveLobby(User user, int lobbyId)
      Removes the user from the lobby with the given id. If the user is the last one, the lobby gets deleted.
      Parameters:
      user - The user who wants to leave the lobby
      lobbyId - The lobby id
      Returns:
      True if leaving the lobby was successful, false if the lobby or the user are not found or if the user is already in the lobby.

    • leaveLobby

      public boolean leaveLobby(UserInfo userInfo, int lobbyId)
      Removes the user from the lobby with the given id. If the user was the last one in the lobby, the lobby gets deleted.
      Parameters:
      userInfo - the user's UserInfo
      lobbyId - the id of the lobby
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if the user or the lobby isn't found or the user isn't in the lobby

    • startGame

      public boolean startGame(UserInfo userInfo, int lobbyId)
      Starts the game by spawing the a game model and controller.
      Parameters:
      userInfo - The UserInfo of the user who tries to start the game
      lobbyId - The id of the lobby
      Returns:
      True if the game is started successfully, false if the game doesn't exist, if the user is not the lobby manager of if the game was already started

    • createLobby

      public LobbyInfo createLobby(UserInfo userInfo)
      Attempts the creation of a new lobby, fails if the user is already in another one. If unsuccessful, the server sends a AlreadyInLobbyErrorEvent to the client.
      Parameters:
      userInfo - the user who wants to create a new lobby
      Returns:
      the LobbyInfo of the created lobby if the attempt was successful, null if the user is already in a lobby
      See Also:
      • LobbyInfo
      • CreateLobbyError

    • clientLogin

      public void clientLogin(UserInfo userInfo, Client client)

    • clientSignUp

      public UserInfo clientSignUp(String username, Client client)

    • removeConnectedClient

      public void removeConnectedClient(MainViewActions clientMainView)

    • broadcastLobbies

      public void broadcastLobbies()
      This function sends a NewLobbiesEvent to all connected clients in the main menu.

    • sendGameEvent

      public void sendGameEvent(UserInfo userInfo, GameEvent event)
      Sends a game event to the given user if they are in-game. The function is public so it can be used by the GameFlowManager the event only to the given user and not broadcast it to all users in the game. This is particularly useful when sending errors to a certain user.
      Parameters:
      userInfo - the user who will receive the event
      event - the event to send

    • updateKeepAlive

      public void updateKeepAlive(UserInfo userInfo)
      This function is used by the handler to update the last keep alive time of a client.
      Parameters:
      userInfo - the user who sent the keep alive

    • gameEnded

      public void gameEnded(int lobbyId)
      Method to call at the end of a game. Broadcasts updated lobbies after deleting the game lobby.
      Parameters:
      lobbyId - the id of the lobby
